description:
At Michael J. Castori Elementary School, we are focused on fulfilling our mission to
provide every child an unwavering focus on powerful and engaging learning experiences
that will prepare them for college, career, and life success. We know these goals cannot
be achieved without the strong support of our parents, our most important partners. We
host a monthly Coffee and Conversation, an annual celebration for our parent
volunteers, and monthly assemblies to celebrate our students and their achievements.
